Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>! I've been waitin'
for you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Today's both of our birthdays, so I whipped up a
big 'ol dinner for us! C'mon, hurry up!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ta-daaah! Feast your eyes on this Fritz-fried
feast! I really went all-out on it, too.
<PAGE>
C'mon, let's dig in while it's still hot.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
There, cleanup finished! I can get that stuff done
in two seconds flat!
<PAGE>
Heh heh. Seeing you look so happy makes all
that blustering around the kitchen worth it, too.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>! I got you a little
somethin', too.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday to the bestest Mama and Papa
ever! Keep being super-awesome parents for us,
okay? ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Happy birthday, Mama and Papa! We love
you!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, Mama and Papa!
<PAGE>
Heh heh! Mama, guess what? We helped Papa
pick out that present for you. ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! We thought really hard for a looong time
about what you'd really like!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, Mama and Papa! Oh, hey
Mama? How old are you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Whoa! <CHILD_NAME_M>, you can't ask that. Mrs.
Corona said it's in...inp...inpole-lite to ask
grown-ups how old they are.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Really? I don't know what an "inpole" is, but it
sounds kinda bad. I guess I won't ask, then.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L><MYNAME>, gettin' hitched to you is the best
thing that ever happened to me. I've never been
happier in my whole life!
<PAGE>
And knowing that we have the same birthday
really makes it feel like we're, y'know, destined to
be together. I love you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Oh, hey, your bag's full. It'd be a shame to
let this present go to waste. How 'bout you open
a slot in your bag?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You sure you wanna toss it?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Wha? You don't want your present?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
O-oh... Maybe some other time, I guess.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Great! So, how 'bout you open a slot in your
bag.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay, let's try this again. Here's your present!

Today was a great birthday. I feel like I can really
give it my all tomorrow!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>. Today must have
been a tiring one for you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But for now, cast off your weariness, wash your
hands and come sit down to dinner. I've made
us a feast for our birthday celebration.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well? Did I surprise you? It IS a rather impressive
spread, if I say so myself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Haha! I'm glad you like it. Come, time to eat.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, everything has been cleaned up.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Haha! You ought to see the look of satisfaction
on your face. Seeing you smile like that makes
me smile, as well.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Here. This is my present to you. I hope you like
it. Happy birthday, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday to the bestest Mama and Papa
ever! Keep being super-awesome parents for us,
okay? ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Happy birthday, Mama and Papa! We love
you!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, Mama and Papa!
<PAGE>
Heh heh! Mama, guess what? We helped Papa
pick out that present for you. ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! We thought really hard for a looong time
about what you'd really like!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, Mama and Papa! Oh, hey
Mama? How old are you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Whoa! <CHILD_NAME_M>, you can't ask that. Mrs.
Corona said it's in...inp...inpole-lite to ask
grown-ups how old they are.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Really? I don't know what an "inpole" is, but it
sounds kinda bad. I guess I won't ask, then.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Simply having you here by my side, smiling is
enough to make me the happiest man on earth.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L><FACE_LOVE>I love you, <MYNAME>. I hope we will be
together for all time.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? It seems your bag is full. It would be a pity
to waste your birthday present. Could you open
a slot in your bag for it?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you sure you don't want it?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What? You don't want your present?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
...Oh. Perhaps...some other time, then.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah. Then could you please open a slot in your
bag for it?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now then, let us try this again. Here is your
birthday present.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>. That's one more
tiring day in the books.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>C'mon in. I kinda went all out today, putting
together a birthday feast for both of us.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I hope you're hungry. I decided to put together a
birthday-themed full-course meal for us.
<PAGE>
C'mon, let's dig in while it's still hot!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, the dishes are all done.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>You certainly ate like it was the best you've ever
had, like always. You make cooking really worth
the effort.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Here, I got a little somethin' for you. I hope you
like it. Happy birthday, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday to the bestest Mama and Papa
ever! Keep being super-awesome parents for us,
okay? ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Happy birthday, Mama and Papa! We love
you!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, Mama and Papa!
<PAGE>
Heh heh! Mama, guess what? We helped Papa
pick out that present for you. ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! We thought really hard for a looong time
about what you'd really like!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, Mama and Papa! Oh, hey
Mama? How old are you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Whoa! <CHILD_NAME_M>, you can't ask that. Mrs.
Corona said it's in...inp...inpole-lite to ask
grown-ups how old they are.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Really? I don't know what an "inpole" is, but it
sounds kinda bad. I guess I won't ask, then.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>Thanks, <MYNAME>. Y'know...for being born,
for meeting me, for building a family with me.
<PAGE>
I love you. I always will. Let's stick by each other
forever.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa there, it looks like your bag is full. It'd be a
shame to waste your present, so how about you
open up a slot for it real quick-like?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You sure you don't want it?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? You don't want your present? Man...after
all the effort I went to picking it out for you...

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Some other time, then, I guess.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
All right, that's more like it! Just open up a slot
for it in your bag, then.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Great. Let's try this again, from the top. Here's
your present!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, welcome home. I am sure you
must be fatigued from your long day.
<PAGE>
But...as today is our birthday, I've elected to
prepare a small feast for us. Come, have a seat.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's our birthday dinner, so I put even more effort
into the cooking than I normally do. I hope you
enjoy the results.
<PAGE>
Now, let's eat before it gets cold.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
There. All finished with the cleanup.
<PAGE>
Heh heh...I see you're still basking in the glow of
a full stomach?
<PAGE>
I am glad to see the meal met with your
approval.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I have a present for you -- not just for your
birthday, but also in thanks for everything you
do for me. I hope you like it.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday to the bestest Mama and Papa
ever! Keep being super-awesome parents for us,
okay? ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Happy birthday, Mama and Papa! We love
you!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, Mama and Papa!
<PAGE>
Heh heh! Mama, guess what? We helped Papa
pick out that present for you. ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! We thought really hard for a looong time
about what you'd really like!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, Mama and Papa! Oh, hey
Mama? How old are you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Whoa! <CHILD_NAME_M>, you can't ask that. Mrs.
Corona said it's in...inp...inpole-lite to ask
grown-ups how old they are.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Really? I don't know what an "inpole" is, but it
sounds kinda bad. I guess I won't ask, then.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
With you by my side, my days truly are filled
with nothing but peace and happiness.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L><FACE_LOVE>I love you, <MYNAME>. I hope that you will stay
by my side forever.
<PAGE>
Of course, even if you thought to leave, I
wouldn't make it an easy decision for you.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? Oh dear. Your bag is full. It would be a pity
to waste your present. How about you open a
slot in your bag for it.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you really certain you want to discard your
present?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What? You really don't want this gift?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I...I see. Perhaps some other time, then.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well then, it would be terrific if you'd open a slot
in your bag.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now then, let's try this again. Here is your
present.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Welcome home. I've been
waiting for you.
<PAGE>
It's our birthdays today, y'know, so I put together
a big feast for us. C'mon over and take a seat.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think I managed to make most of it right.
Er...mostly. I hope you like it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Let me know what you think later. But let's not
wait until it gets cold -- go ahead and dig in.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
There. Cleanup's all done.
<PAGE>
Sheesh. You've been smiling ear-to-ear this
whole time. Gotta say, seeing you like that
makes me happy.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's a birthday present for you. Don't know if
you'll like it or not, but I hope you do.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for everything, <MYNAME>. Really.
Happy birthday.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday to the bestest Mama and Papa
ever! Keep being super-awesome parents for us,
okay? ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Happy birthday, Mama and Papa! We love
you!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, Mama and Papa!
<PAGE>
Heh heh! Mama, guess what? We helped Papa
pick out that present for you. ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! We thought really hard for a looong time
about what you'd really like!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, Mama and Papa! Oh, hey
Mama? How old are you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Whoa! <CHILD_NAME_M>, you can't ask that. Mrs.
Corona said it's in...inp...inpole-lite to ask
grown-ups how old they are.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Really? I don't know what an "inpole" is, but it
sounds kinda bad. I guess I won't ask, then.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I realize I'm not the greatest with words, so I
know there've been times I've made you unsure
about stuff.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L><FACE_LOVE>But today, I wanna say it clearly, so you know.
<MYNAME>...I love you. More than anybody.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Eh? Oh, hey. Your bag's full. Wasting your
present would suck, so how about you open up
a slot for it?

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You sure you really don't want it?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Then...you don't want your present?

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
...Oh. Forget it, then.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah. Well, just open up a slot for it in your bag,
then.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay, let's try this again. Here's your present.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>. You've gotta be
bushed from your long day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But sweep all those cares under the rug, 'cause
today's our birthdays! I put together a little feast
for us, so c'mon, have a seat.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How does it look? I tried to whip up plenty of
the things I know you like...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Let me know what you think after the meal, but
for now, let's dig in while it's hot.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, cleanup's all done.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Haha! You've looked contented as a cat in front
of a fireplace this whole evening. That makes all
the cooking totally worth it.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>. Here, I got a little
something for the most important lady in my
life. I hope you like it.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday to the bestest Mama and Papa
ever! Keep being super-awesome parents for us,
okay? ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Happy birthday, Mama and Papa! We love
you!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, Mama and Papa!
<PAGE>
Heh heh! Mama, guess what? We helped Papa
pick out that present for you. ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! We thought really hard for a looong time
about what you'd really like!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, Mama and Papa! Oh, hey
Mama? How old are you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Whoa! <CHILD_NAME_M>, you can't ask that. Mrs.
Corona said it's in...inp...inpole-lite to ask
grown-ups how old they are.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Really? I don't know what an "inpole" is, but it
sounds kinda bad. I guess I won't ask, then.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>You always do so much to support me,
<MYNAME>, and I'm truly grateful for it.
<PAGE>
I want to do just as much -- or more, even -- to
support you, too. So please, lean on me
whenever you want to. I'll be there for you.
<PAGE>
I love you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Whoops, your bag is full. It'd be a pity to
waste your present, so how about you open up
a slot for it?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you really sure you don't want it?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? You don't want your present?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
...Oh. Maybe some other time then, I guess.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Right on. So, how about you open a slot in your
bag for it?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay, let's try this again from the top. Here's
your present.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>. I have been
waiting for you.
<PAGE>
Both of us celebrate our birthdays today, so I've
taken the liberty of preparing a banquet dinner
for us. Come, have a seat.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ohohohoho! Did I surprise you? Cooking this
much food was but a trifle to someone of my
talents, of course!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Er...then why are my hands covered with band-
aids?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Erm! I, ah, h-had an unfortunate accident, is all.
Nothing to do with the cooking, ohohoho!
Nothing at all! N-now, eat up!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There. All done with the cleanup.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>My, my! Your face is the picture of
contentment. I am even more glad now that I
made the effort I did.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here, this present is for you. I thought for a long
time about what you might like best.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Happy birthday, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday to the bestest Papa and Mama
ever! Keep being super-awesome parents for us,
okay? ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Happy birthday, Papa and Mama! We love
you!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, Papa and Mama!
<PAGE>
Heh heh! Papa, guess what? We helped Mama
pick out that present for you. ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! We thought really hard for a looong time
about what you'd really like!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, Papa and Mama! Oh, hey Papa?
How old are you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Whoa! <CHILD_NAME_M>, you can't ask that. Mrs.
Corona said it's in...inp...inpole-lite to ask
grown-ups how old they are.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Really? I don't know what an "inpole" is, but it
sounds kinda bad. I guess I won't ask, then.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I, er, always have difficulty putting this into
words, but...today is a special day, so I'll make a
special effort to say it plainly.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L><FACE_LOVE><MYNAME>...Thank you for always going along
with my whims. I love you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. Your bag is full. It would hardly do to
waste your present, so open a slot for it.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you certain you don't want it?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What? You truly do not want your present?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I see. And after all the effort I went to, picking it
out. How cold-hearted of you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, excellent. Now, just open a slot in your bag.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Perfect. Now, let's try this again. Here is your
present.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>. You must be so
tired after such a long day at work.
<PAGE>
But hey, today is both of our birthdays, and I've
made a little birthday dinner for us. C'mon and
have a seat.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oho, I'm happy to see you looking so pleased.
We've got twice the celebrating to do today, so I
thought we should err on the side of excess.
<PAGE>
Now, let's eat while the food's still warm.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, all done. Everything's been cleaned up.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ohoho! By the look of things, I'd say you're
getting some lasting satisfaction out of that
meal.
<PAGE>
I'm glad to see my effort didn't go
unappreciated. All that kitchen wrangling feels
more worth it.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Aaaaaand...I got you a little something for your
birthday, too. I hope you like it. Happy birthday,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday to the bestest Papa and Mama
ever! Keep being super-awesome parents for us,
okay? ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Happy birthday, Papa and Mama! We love
you!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, Papa and Mama!
<PAGE>
Heh heh! Papa, guess what? We helped Mama
pick out that present for you. ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! We thought really hard for a looong time
about what you'd really like!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, Papa and Mama! Oh, hey Papa?
How old are you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Whoa! <CHILD_NAME_M>, you can't ask that. Mrs.
Corona said it's in...inp...inpole-lite to ask
grown-ups how old they are.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Really? I don't know what an "inpole" is, but it
sounds kinda bad. I guess I won't ask, then.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Every year on this day, I can't help but think that
maybe all this was destiny. In spite of our age
difference, we share a birthday.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L><FACE_LOVE>Thank you, <MYNAME>. Thank you for being
born, for finding me, and most of all for
marrying me. I love you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my. Your bag is full. I'd feel terrible if this
present I got for you went to waste. How about
you open a slot for it?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you really sure you don't want it?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What? You...don't want your present?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh... Well, I guess if you don't, you don't.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, excellent. Now, will you please open a slot
in your bag?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, let's give this another go. Here's your
present.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>! You've gotta be
bushed, after working up a sweat on the farm
today!
<PAGE>
But heeeeey! Today's our birthdays, so I kinda
went all out and whipped up a big birthday
dinner for us. Wash your hands and have a seat!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Heehee! I'm so glad you like it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>It all looks so yummy, huh? Let's dig in before it
gets cold!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, all done with the cleanup. Heehee! Oh,
